  3/** @file    vsip/core/expr/map_subset_block.hpp
  4    @author  Assem Salama
  5    @date    2007-04-26
  6    @brief   VSIPL++ Library: Map_subset_block class.
  7*/
  8
  9#ifndef VSIP_CORE_EXPR_MAP_SUBSET_BLOCK_HPP
 10#define VSIP_CORE_EXPR_MAP_SUBSET_BLOCK_HPP
 11
 12
 13#include <vsip/support.hpp>
 14
 15namespace vsip
 16{
 17namespace impl
 18{
 19
 20template <typename Block,
 21          typename MapT>
 22class Map_subset_block
 23{
 24
 25public:
 26  static dimension_type const dim = Block::dim;
 27  typedef typename Block::value_type value_type;
 28  typedef Local_or_global_map<dim>   map_type;
 29
 30  // Constructors.
 31public:
 32  Map_subset_block(Block& blk, MapT const& map)
 33    : blk_(blk),
 34      map_(map),
 35      sb_(map_.subblock()),
 36      dom_(map_.template impl_subblock_domain<dim>(sb_))
 37    {}
 38
 39
 40  // Accessors.
 41public:
 42  length_type size() const VSIP_NOTHROW
 43  { return dom_.size(); }
 44
 45  length_type size(dimension_type block_dim, dimension_type d)
 46    const VSIP_NOTHROW
 47  { assert(block_dim == dim); return dom_[d].size(); }
 48
 49  void increment_count() const VSIP_NOTHROW {}
 50  void decrement_count() const VSIP_NOTHROW {}
 51  map_type const& map() const VSIP_NOTHROW { return *(new map_type());}
 52
 53
 54  value_type get(index_type i) const
 55  {
 56    index_type global_i;
 57
 58    assert(i < dom_[0].size());
 59    global_i = map_.impl_global_from_local_index(0,sb_,i);
 60    return blk_.get(global_i);
 61  }
 62
 63  value_type get(index_type i, index_type j) const
 64  {
 65    index_type global_i, global_j;
 66
 67    assert(i < dom_[0].size());
 68    assert(j < dom_[1].size());
 69    global_i = map_.impl_global_from_local_index(0,sb_,i);
 70    global_j = map_.impl_global_from_local_index(1,sb_,j);
 71    return blk_.get(global_i,global_j);
 72  }
 73
 74  value_type get(index_type i, index_type j, index_type k) const
 75  {
 76    index_type global_i, global_j, global_k;
 77
 78    assert(i < dom_[0].size());
 79    assert(j < dom_[1].size());
 80    assert(k < dom_[2].size());
 81    global_i = map_.impl_global_from_local_index(0,sb_,i);
 82    global_j = map_.impl_global_from_local_index(1,sb_,j);
 83    global_k = map_.impl_global_from_local_index(2,sb_,k);
 84    return blk_.get(global_i,global_j,global_k);
 85  }
 86
 87  // Member data.
 88private:
 89  Block&       blk_;
 90  MapT const&  map_;
 91  index_type   sb_;
 92  Domain<dim>  dom_;
 93
 94};
 95
 96// Store Distributed_generator_block by reference
 97template <typename Block, typename MapT>
 98struct View_block_storage<Map_subset_block<Block, MapT> >
 99  : By_value_block_storage<Map_subset_block<Block, MapT> >
100{};
101
102
103} // namespace vsip::impl
104} // namespace vsip
105
106#endif // VSIP_CORE_EXPR_MAP_SUBSET_BLOCK_HPP
